Text:
Mr. VLIS..looking at the kind of films you've uploaded in the past clearly shows u've taste..ones like Manhattan, Hard Eight, Bergman's Persona and Saaraband..also others films which are fairly new yet good..hence, I'd like to ask a favour..why dont you upload more of those good ol' classics..stuff by Bergman and other legends like Godard, Tarkovsky, Bresson, etc..would be extremely grateful..u could upload one new and one foreign film..alternating..I hope u pay heed to my request.

Thanks and Kindest regards,

A true ardent fan

I never take requests and rarely reply to comments but i'll do it this time because your comment is to the point and your observation is correct.
I've uploaded too much "hollywood" lately but decent movies IMO.
I'll try to make things right in the future :)

BTW, i've also encoded and shared Bergman's "The Seventh Seal" :P
You didn't mention it in your comment :P

TC m8 and thanx for your comment :)

Really appreciate ur quick response. Let me be more precise..the torrents which kept me n my lovely lady ecstatic with joy.

North By Northwest
The Lives Of Others
Klute (hadnt heard of this one before..but sure was a treat)
Casablanca
The Innocents
Heavenly Creatures
Y tu mama tambien
Chinatown
Talk To Her
Lost In Translation
Monster's Ball
Before Sunset
Before Sunrise

I hope that establishes how much we appreciate ur efforts..as mentioned before hoping for more of foreign language films by auteurs.

Good Day Sir.
The American accents are so thick that you may need subs. Phenomenal movie. Great up.
Film is not complete only shows 939MB of the 1.4Gb download waste of time
